TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以处理事件，以提供自定义排序。You can handle the event to provide custom sorting. 此事件时才会发生时未设置属性和属性设置为`false`。This event occurs only when the property is not set and the property is set to `false`. 每个对正在排序的列中单元格的一次发生此事件。This event occurs once for each pair of cells in the column being sorted. 仅当用户单击的列的标头时，才发生属性值为，或当您调用重载。It occurs only when the user clicks the header of a column with a property value of , or when you call the overload. 当发生此事件时具有的列属性值为，必须通过自己显示排序标志符号属性。When this event occurs for a column with a property value of , you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the property. 可以使用此事件在一列或多个列中使用单元格的值的行进行排序。You can use this event to sort rows using the cell values in one column or in multiple columns. 使用并属性中指定的列中的单元格值进行比较属性。Use the and properties to compare cell values in the column specified in the property. 使用并访问通过其他列中的值的属性集合。Use the and properties to access values in other columns through the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将中多个列进行排序。The following code example demonstrates the use of in a multiple column sort. 此示例摘自[如何： 自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的排序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Sorting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Column As DataGridViewColumn

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是用于确定和控制中以编程方式排序的排序行为。This property is useful in determining and controlling sort behavior in programmatic sorts. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将中多个列进行排序。The following code example demonstrates the use of in a multiple column sort. 在此示例中的 ID 列用于确定最终顺序中是否存在完全相同的值已排序的列，因此没有额外的排序将在 ID 列中重复的值是否完成。In this example the ID column is used to determine the final order if there are identical values in the sorted column, so no additional sorting will be done if there are duplicate values in the ID column. 此示例摘自[如何： 自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的排序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Sorting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare/VB/form1.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对基于多个列中单元格的值的行进行排序时，此属性很有用。This property is useful when sorting rows based on the cell values in multiple columns. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将中多个列进行排序。The following code example demonstrates the use of in a multiple column sort. 此示例摘自[如何： 自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的排序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Sorting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SortResult { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.SortResult : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示被比较单元格将遵循的排序顺序。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the order in which the compared cells will be sorted.

value.span: 如果第一个单元格将排在第二个单元格之前，则小于零；如果第一个单元格和第二个单元格的值相等，则等于零；如果第二个单元格将排在第一个单元格之前，则大于零。

span.span: Less than zero if the first cell will be sorted before the second cell; zero if the first cell and second cell have equivalent values; greater than zero if the second cell will be sorted before the first cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此值通常是将执行的处理程序中的上一个操作事件。Setting this value is typically the last operation you will perform in a handler for the event. 通常将此值的比较方法的返回值如。You will typically set this value to the return value of a comparison method such as . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将中多个列进行排序。The following code example demonstrates the use of in a multiple column sort. 此示例摘自[如何： 自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的排序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Sorting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
